message.content: Yes, the authors provided instructions, details of the experimental design, and various figures/scenarios/screenings that were used in the study, which was conducted with human subjects through Amazon Mechanical Turk. They included screenshots and figures illustrating the practice session (Figure 2), quiz (Figure 3), and catch trial (Figure 4), as well as the experimental design (Figure 1).

Yes, the authors used Amazon Mechanical Turk (AMT) for their human experiments, and they provided detailed information about the experimental design, consent form, instructions, and quizzes for participants. They also included screenshots of the practice session, quiz, and catch trial. This information can be found in the appendix section A Human experiments of the paper.

Yes, the authors included the full text of instructions given to participants along with screenshots in the appendix section of the paper. They provided detailed information on the experimental design, the process of selecting and screening participants, and examples of quizzes and catch trials used during the study.
